Text: It is fear, Mr. Holmes. It is terror.
You have come in by train this morning, I see.
A steam engine hissed as it pulled into the platform.
You had a good drive in a dog-cart, along heavy roads.
Sir, I can stand this strain no longer; I shall go mad if it continues.
Holmes turned to his desk and drew out a small case-book.
It is fear, Mr. Holmes. It is terror.
You had a good drive in a dog-cart, along heavy roads.
Sir, I can stand this strain no longer; I shall go mad if it continues.
Holmes turned to his desk and drew out a small case-book.
